EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: This is your Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select either Heart, Sky or Thorn. The rest of this tree's options will be determined by this choice.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description: You follow the path of the Heart. Each Core Ability in this tree, including this one, grants the following: +5 Fire, Light, Positive and Universal Spell Power, +50 Maximum Spellpoints, +1 Epic bonus to all DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description: You follow the path of the Sky. Each Core Ability in this tree, including this one, grants the following: +5 Electric, Cold, Sonic and Universal Spell Power, +50 Maximum Spellpoints, +1 Epic bonus to all DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thorn
EnhancementSelection.Description: You follow the path of the Thorn. Each Core Ability in this tree, including this one, grants the following: +5 Acid, Force, Poison and Universal Spell Power, +50 Maximum Spellpoints, +1 Epic bonus to all DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Now Grow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose another aspect of nature to gain a minor affinity for. You cannot choose what you took in the first core again. This does NOT confer eligibility to abilities later in the tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain a minor affinity for Heart. You gain the following for each Core Ability you take in this tree, including this one: +3 Fire, Light, and Positive Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain a minor affinity for Sky. You gain the following for each Core Ability you take in this tree, including this one: +3 Electric, Cold, and Sonic Spell Power.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thorn
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain a minor affinity for Thorn. You gain the following for each Core Ability you take in this tree, including this one: +3 Acid, Force, and Poison Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Weathering the Elements
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain 15% absorption against Fire/Cold/Acid/Electric/Poison damage. Whenever you cast any protection from element spell it grants you 25 points per level instead of 12 with no level cap.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Seeking Balance
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Reflex Saving Throws, +[2/4/6] Tumble and Balance. Rank 3: If you are using a Quarterstaff, you gain +1 Damage and +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Well Weathered
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Builder
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain a Spell that builds Primal Charges based on your nature

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spring to Summer
EnhancementSelection.Description: Primal Builder: A burst of butterflies forms around the caster in a small radius applying a copy of rejuvenation cocoon to all allies. After several seconds the butterflies burst into flame causing 2d6 fire damage per character level to all nearby enemies, with a reflex save for half damage (DC: 20 + Evocation Bonuses + Highest Mental Ability Score Modifier). For each enemy struck, gain one Primal Charge up to two. Activation Cost: 20 Spell Points. Cooldown: 12 Seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Storm Catcher
EnhancementSelection.Description: Primal Builder : Target enemy becomes chilled to the bone for 8 seconds, which slows them and cuases them to take 1d6 per 2 character levels in Cold damage every two seconds, with no save. As the effect ends the target will also be struck by a lightning bolt for 1d6+6 electric damage per caster level, with a Fortitude save for half damage, for the duration of the effect. You gain one Primal Charge. Activation Cost: 20 Spell Points. Cooldown: 8 Seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Carrion Swarm
EnhancementSelection.Description: Primal Builder: Target enemy becomes covered with biting acidic and poisonous insects. Every 2 seconds they take 1d6+1 acid and 1d6+1 poison damage per 2 character levels for 8 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times. Each stack also causes a -4 penalty to attack rolls and Armor class. You gain a Primal Charge. Cooldown: 6 Seconds. Activation Cost: 20 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Nature's Friend
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you sit to rest at a rest shrine your selected friend of nature visits you briefly and offers comfort. You and nearby party members are granted a buff that lasts until the end of your current quest.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Bat of Echoes
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10 Sonic Spell Power, +15 Sonic Absorption, +3 Listen

EnhancementSelection.Name: Bird of Wind
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10 Electric Spell Power, +1% Dodge, +3 Spot

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fox of Flame
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10 Fire Spell Power, +2 Damage with Sneak Attacks, +3 Move Silently

EnhancementSelection.Name: Frog of the Lake
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10 Cold Spell Power, +2 Magical Resistance Rating, +3 Jump

EnhancementSelection.Name: Spider of the Deeps
EnhancementSelection.Description: +10 Poison and Acid Spell Power, 15% Poison Absorption

EnhancementSelection.Name: Squirrel of Luck
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 to Attack, Damage, and all Saving Throws

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Rejuvenation Cocoon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Protects target with a shield of [35/75/150] Temporary Hit Points for 9 seconds. Heals 5d6 HP every 2 seconds while the shield persists.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Thrive
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Each Primal Charge you have now grant you 2% Spell Cost Reduction.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Natural Shielding
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 10 Maximum Hit Points, +2 Magical Resistance Rating. Your summons, pets, and hirelings gain 60% bonus to Maximum Hit Points, +3 Magical Resistance Rating, +4 Reflex Saving Throws, and gain the Evasion feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Mantle of Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Primal Avatar Destiny Mantle

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Healing spells have a chance to apply a copy of Rejuvination Cocoon to your target. Your Fire, Light, and Alignment spells have a chance to apply a blast of that damage type for an extra 1d3 per character level. All effects scale with 100% Spell Power. Each effect can only occur once every 5 seconds, tracked separately. Gain a Primal Charge whenever either of these effects occur.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Cold, Electric, and Sonic spells have a chance to blast one target for an additional 1d3 damage per character level of the same type as the spell used. Each element can only occur once every 5 seconds, tracked separately. Gain a Primal Charge whenever this occurs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thorn
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your Acid, Poison, and Force spells have a chance to blast one target for an additional 1d3 damage per character level of the same type as the spell used. Each element can only occur once every 5 seconds, tracked separately. Gain a Primal Charge whenever this occurs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Spender
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain a Spell that expends Primal Charges based on your nature.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Reborn in Fire
EnhancementSelection.Description: Primal Spender: A swirl of fire surrounds you dealing 1d6 fire damage per character level to enemies and healing allies for 1d3 per character level. This consumes all Primal Charges, and both the damage and healing are increased by 25% per Primal Charge. If 3 or more Primal Charges are consumed, the bonus damage and healing are doubled and you gain Dancing Flame for 6 seconds. Dancing Flame: +35% Uncapped Dodge. Cooldown: 5 Seconds. Activation Cost: 20 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thunder Snow
EnhancementSelection.Description: Primal Spender: Sends forth a wide wave of freezing hail before you with a narrow blast of lightning at its center directly in front of the caster. The hail deals 1d6 cold damage per character level, Fortitude save for half (DC: 20 + Evocation Bonuses + Highest Mental Ability Score Modifier). The bolt of lightning strikes for 1d6 per character level. Reflex save for half. This consumes all Primal Charges, and damage of both the hail and lightning are increased by 25% per Primal Charge. If 3 or more Primal Charges are consumed, enemies caught within are slowed by 70%. Cooldown: 20 Seconds. Activation Cost: 20 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shard Storm
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summons a cloud of acidic poisonous shards that randomly strikes enemies within 15 meters. 6 strikes over 6 seconds. Each shard deals 1d3 poison and acid damage per character level. This consumes all Primal Charges, and the damage of each shard is increased by 25% per Primal Charge. If 3 or more Primal Charges are consumed, the bonus damage is doubled, and you gain Shard Deflection for 12 seconds. Shard Deflection: You gain 30% of your Maximum Hit Points as Temporary Hit Points. Cooldown: 5 Seconds. Activation Cost: 20 Seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Spirit Boon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Multiselector

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mighty
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/2] Primal bonus to Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution. Rank 3: Your Primal Charge Cap is increased by 1.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Mindful
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/2] Primal bonus to Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma. Rank 3: Your Primal Charge Cap is increased by 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Improved Form
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in any Elemental Form, you gain +[3/6/10] Universal Spell Power. While in any Wild Shape, you gain +[2/4/6] Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Spirit Heart
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Healing Amplification. Your Healing spells have a [5/10/15]% chance to grant a Divine Charge while you are in combat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Magic of the Old World
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Spell School to Specialize in.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Evocation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Evocation Spell DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Conjuration
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Conjuration Spell DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Transmutation
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Transmutation Spell DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Nature's Blessing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: When you rest the spirit of nature manifests as a Unicorn and provides with nature's blessing to you and nearby party members. Nature's Blessing: +5% Insight bonus to Maximum Hitpoints. This effect lasts until you leave the dungeon.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Flowers in the Thorns
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Stepping inside a Spike Growth or Entangle spell, either hostile or friendly, heals you for 1d3 hit points every 5 seconds per character level of the spell's owner.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Natural Evasion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: ain the Evasion Feat. Exclusive from other enhancements that grant this feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Shared Mantle
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your summons now also benefit from your Mantle of Nature. When the mantle triggers for them they have a chance to give their summoner a Primal Charge. This still uses your spell power or melee/ranged power to scale.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heart
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[5/10/15] Fire, Light, and Positive Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[5/10/15] Cold, Electric, and Sonic Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Thorn
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[5/10/15] Acid, Poison, and Force Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Epic Improved Metamagics I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Meta Magic to improve.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Empower Metamagic by [2/4/6] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Maximize Metamagic by [3/6/9] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Quicken Metamagic by [1/2/4] spell points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Epic Improved Metamagics II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Meta Magic to improve.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Empower
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Empower Metamagic by [2/4/6] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Maximize
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Maximize Metamagic by [3/6/9] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Quicken
EnhancementSelection.Description: Reduces the cost of the Quicken Metamagic by [1/2/4] spell points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Heart Flame Dryad
EnhancementSelection.Description: Creates an elder dryad that casts fire, light, and healing spells. She remains rooted to her summoning point. Duration: 15 Seconds. Cooldown: 15 Seconds. Activation Cost: 50 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Storm Guard
EnhancementSelection.Description: Creates a greater storm spirit to blast your foes with lightning, cold, and sound using your casting stats. Remains bound to their summoning spot. Duration: 15 Seconds. Cooldown: 15 Seconds. Activation Cost: 50 Spell Points.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Briar Patch
EnhancementSelection.Description: Summoned a greater thorn spirit to blast your foes with Acid, Poison, and Force using your casting stats. Remains bound to their summoning spot. Duration: 15 Seconds. Cooldown: 15 Seconds. Activation Cost: 50 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Ancient Wisdom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to all Spell DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Mass Frog
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Up to six nearby enemies are turned into frogs. Each may avoid ribbiting on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs. DC (20+ Highest of Wisdom/Intelligence/Charisma modifier + Transmutation bonuses). Cooldown: 1 Minute. Activation Cost: 60 Spell Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Primal Channel
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain an enhancement spell cost reduction of 10% to all spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Primal Avatar: Epic Improved Intensify Spell
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Reduces the cost of the Intensify Spell Metamagic by [2/4/6] Spell Points.
